channel.title: The chronicles of riddick: AODA and EFBB
channel.description:
How many people have this game?
I think its a really great game on the story mode. The stealth works fine and the guns are fantastic!
The re-mastered escape from butcher bay game is included on the disk aswell!
i reccomend this game to everyone

item.title: The chronicles of riddick: AODA and EFBB
item.dc:creator: Deimos
item.description:
Great games, have the new ones and the original of the first one.

Read full topic
item.source: The chronicles of riddick: AODA and EFBB

item.title: The chronicles of riddick: AODA and EFBB
item.dc:creator: Siggs
item.description:
Call me old fashioned, but I prefer the older stuff, in other words Pitch Black, and EFBB, as opposed to the Chronicles of Riddick, and Dark Athena.
.

Read full topic
item.source: The chronicles of riddick: AODA and EFBB

item.title: The chronicles of riddick: AODA and EFBB
item.dc:creator: John_Killer118
item.description:
I want to play that game for SO LONG! But my local rental store doesn’t have a copy. Some douche keeps renting it before me.
I can’t find the movies either.

Read full topic
item.source: The chronicles of riddick: AODA and EFBB

item.title: The chronicles of riddick: AODA and EFBB
item.dc:creator: Siggs
item.description:
I dunno about Dark Athena, but I’m sure the EFBB part will be very good, if it stays true to the original.
.

item.source: The chronicles of riddick: AODA and EFBB

item.title: The chronicles of riddick: AODA and EFBB
item.dc:creator: chipstix4
item.description:
Ibanez:

Yeah, awesome game. Easy to get frustrated, though. It gets pretty ridiculous in parts. I wish it was possible to complete the whole game via stealth, but it forces you to go in guns blazing several times, which doesn’t work out well.

Did you try the online mode?

It kind of feels like Unreal tournament

Read full topic
item.source: The chronicles of riddick: AODA and EFBB

item.title: The chronicles of riddick: AODA and EFBB
item.dc:creator: blue
item.description:
ive got it for like 2 weeks, but i tried to play it many times and i wasnt able to play for more than 30 min, man the game is boring …
